reviews.name: Marie Dubois
reviews.content: I sent a birthday gift to my sister in Belgium. The traveler was super nice and I tracked the package in real time. A wonderful experience!

reviews.name: Thomas Martin
reviews.content: As a salesman who travels often, ColisGo allows me to supplement my income easily. The app is intuitive and customers are very grateful.

reviews.name: Sophie Chen
reviews.content: For my e-commerce, ColisGo has become essential. Fast deliveries, reduced costs and exceptional customer service. I recommend 100%!

faq.title: Rideshare FAQ
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions.

questions.question: How do you guarantee the security of my packages?
questions.answer: Each traveler is verified with ID. We use a secure code system for each exchange and offer comprehensive insurance. Real-time GPS tracking allows you to follow your package at any time.

questions.question: How much does it cost to send a package with ColisGo?
questions.answer: Our rates are 30 to 50% lower than traditional carriers. The final price depends on distance, weight and package size. Travelers propose their rates, you choose the offer that suits you.

questions.question: What happens if my package is lost or damaged?
questions.answer: All shipments are covered by our partner insurance. In case of problems, our customer service intervenes immediately. The secure code system and traveler verification considerably minimize risks.

questions.question: How to become a ColisGo traveler?
questions.answer: Simply create your profile, verify your identity and indicate your usual routes. You will receive shipping proposals on your routes. It's an excellent way to monetize your existing trips.

questions.question: In which cities is ColisGo available?
questions.answer: ColisGo currently covers more than 1,250 cities in Canada, with continuous expansion. Our network grows daily thanks to our growing community of travelers.

questions.question: Can I track my package in real time?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our mobile app allows you to track your package via GPS in real time. You receive notifications at each step: pickup, transit, arrival and confirmed delivery.

questions.question: Is there a weight or size limit for packages?
questions.answer: Packages must be hand-portable (max 20kg) and fit in standard cabin luggage. For larger shipments, our algorithm automatically finds travelers equipped with suitable vehicles.

questions.question: How is payment secured?
questions.answer: All payments go through our secure platform. The traveler is only paid after delivery confirmation by the recipient. We accept credit cards, PayPal and bank transfers.

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.subtitle: ColisGo adapts to all user profiles

profiles.title: I am an individual who ships
profiles.description: Do you need to send a package quickly and safely? With ColisGo, simply post your listing indicating the departure location, destination, weight and value of your package. A traveler who is already making this trip can accept your request and transport your package. Your payment is secured via the platform and is only released once delivery is confirmed. With ColisGo, shipping becomes simple, economical and collaborative.

profiles.title: I am an individual who transports
profiles.description: Do you travel regularly between two cities and have space in your vehicle? ColisGo allows you to monetize your trips by transporting packages for shippers. Accept a listing, pick up the package and make the delivery during your usual trip. You earn money while helping others, with the guarantee of secure payment through the platform. ColisGo transforms your travels into opportunities!

profiles.title: I am a professional carrier
profiles.description: Do you have a transport license and are looking to optimize your routes? With ColisGo, access a customer base looking for a reliable solution to ship their packages. Fill your available trips, accept shipments corresponding to your itinerary and increase your revenue. As a professional, you benefit from increased visibility and tools adapted to manage your shipments. ColisGo becomes a partner to develop your logistics activity.

profiles.title: I am a business that ships
profiles.description: Do you want to offer your customers a flexible and affordable delivery solution? ColisGo connects your business with travelers and carriers available to handle your shipments. Reduce your logistics costs while guaranteeing fast and secure delivery. Whether you are a merchant, e-merchant or SME, ColisGo adapts to your needs by offering you collaborative and efficient logistics. With ColisGo, delivery becomes a strategic asset for your growth.

steps.title: The process in 3 simple steps
steps.subtitle: From creating your listing to delivery

list.title: Create your listing
list.description: Enter your package details: origin, destination, weight, dimensions and value. Add a photo if necessary.

list.title: Choose your carrier
list.description: Receive proposals from verified travelers. Compare prices, reviews and choose the one that suits you.

list.title: Track your delivery
list.description: Pay securely and track your package in real time until delivery is confirmed by the recipient.
